item.title: events
item.description: future conferences: 24th Internation Conference on Computational Statistics (August 29-31, 2021) 17th onference of the International Federation of Classification Societies (August 24-28, 2021) 63rd ISI World Statistics Congress 2021 (July 11-16, 2021) Data Science, Statistics & Visualization 2021 (July 07-09, 2021) Innovation and Society 5.0: Statistical and Economic Models and Techniques for Quality Assessment (July 01-02, 2021) 50th Scientific Meeting of the Italian Statistical Society (June 23-25, 2021) recent events Workshop on Models and Learning for Clustering and Classification (September 2020) Data Science, Statistics & Visualization 2020 (July 29-31, 2020)

item.title: projects
item.description: I am a statistician and my research is focused on the methodological and computational aspects of data analysis. The best feeling is when I can use my knowledge to solve practical and real problems. I am currently working on latent variable models, unsupervised classification and model-based composite indicators. ongoing projects events teaching material
